name: Air Fryer Broccoli
author: Kisha McDaniel Logsdon
summary: Have you tried making broccoli in your air fryer? All you need is olive oil, salt and pepper, and the broccoli turns out wonderfully crispy and tasty.
ingredients: 1 head fresh broccoli, cut into florets
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine broccoli, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a resealable bag
Set aside to allow the broccoli to soak up the oil, about 30 minutes
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Place broccoli in the air fryer basket and cook until desired crispiness, 10 to 15 minutes, shaking air fryer basket halfway through cook time
